definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: We are independent in finance and responsible for its own financial gain or loss.
sentences.chinese: 我们是独立核算的公司，各分厂有独立的财务。

sentences.english: Choosing standard money of charge to an account is business accounting of accounting of industry of condition foreign enterprise cannot evasive problem.
sentences.chinese: 选择记账本位币是境外企业会计核算不能回避的问题。

sentences.english: Third, the basic concept and measuring methods of accounting of sustainable development.
sentences.chinese: 第三，可持续发展核算的基本概念和测度方法问题。

sentences.english: It is also shown that integral kernel operators can be expressedin terms of gradient and divergent operators.
sentences.chinese: 也证明了积分核算子可用梯度与散度算子表出。

sentences.english: Accounting centralized assessing system is one of the common practice of accounting designating system.
sentences.chinese: 会计集中核算制是会计委派制的一种常用方式。

sentences.english: A. The accurate diagnosis of postdates pregnancy can be made only by proper dating.
sentences.chinese: 过期妊娠通过正确核算孕周可做出确切诊断。

sentences.english: It is also shown that integral kernel operators can be expressedin terms of gradient and pergent operators.
sentences.chinese: 也证明了积分核算子可用梯度与散度算子表出。

sentences.english: Rigorous air-cooler model Rigorous Air Cooler design and rating.
sentences.chinese: 严格空冷器设计和核算软件。

sentences.english: The spread of economic calculation is basic to income maximization.
sentences.chinese: 推广经济核算是收入最优化的基础。

sentences.english: The competent tax authorities shall strengthen their management on the business accounting of tax deduction ledgers .
sentences.chinese: 主管税务机关应加强对税款抵扣台帐核算的管理。

sentences.english: Approved accounting methods of enterprise merger include purchase method and equity method.
sentences.chinese: 对企业合并进行会计核算主要有购买法和权益结合法。

sentences.english: Perpetual Inventory Method is the basic tool for capital stock accounting.
sentences.chinese: 永续盘存法是资本存量核算的基本工具。

sentences.english: Subsidiary accounts should be set up for prepaid expenses according to different types of expenses.
sentences.chinese: 待摊费用应按费用种类设置明细账，进行明细核算。

sentences.english: Perform recipe costing for food and beverage.
sentences.chinese: 对餐饮的食品和饮料进行成本核算。

sentences.english: The implementation of full-cost accounting is of great significance to the operation and management of hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 全成本核算的实行对医院的经营管理具有重要的意义。

sentences.english: The doubt of the profit etc. of the business was put out by the municipal assemblyman .
sentences.chinese: 从市议会议员关于事业的核算性等疑问被发出了。

definition: per book/as recorded in the accounts
sum (result of addition)/addition/total/to add up a number of items/to accumulate
final account/to calculate the final bill/fig. to draw up plans to deal with sth
to set aside/to make provision for (capital requirements)
to verify accounting records/also written 對帳|对帐[dui4 zhang4]
